body_html:
@asimshankar
I added the sources(tensorflow/java/src/main/java) to my android project.
according to this article(),
Train function of JAVA api is not sufficient.

Is it right?
TF Slim or other convolution layers are not supported I guess.

body:
@asimshankar 
I added  the sources(tensorflow/java/src/main/java) to my android project.
according to this article([](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46030577/how-to-train-a-model-in-tensorflow-using-java)),
Train function of JAVA api is not sufficient.

Is it right?
TF Slim or other convolution layers are not supported I guess.
